name: Quiz me a Quiz - A True Gamers Test
name_original: Quiz me a Quiz - A True Gamers Test
description:
This is my first ever game. It was done as a project for college, Programming 101 class.

It is a gaming quiz and there is even a surprise at the end! 

Hope you all like it and onto the next one!!

Visit Vracc Studioto know more about me and my art: https://vraccstudio.com
